test-set.name: sequence
test-set.description: Tests the xsl:sequence instruction and other expressions that construct sequences

test-case.name: sequence-0101
test-case.description: Test sequence construction in a variable

test-case.name: sequence-0102
test-case.description: Test sequence construction in a variable

test-case.name: sequence-0103
test-case.description: Test sequence construction of parentless elements

test-case.name: sequence-0104
test-case.description: Test sequence construction of parentless elements, followed by attachment to a new element

test-case.name: sequence-0105
test-case.description: Test sequence construction of parentless attributes, followed by attachment to a new element

test-case.name: sequence-0106
test-case.description: Test sequence construction with atomization

test-case.name: sequence-0107
test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence

test-case.name: sequence-0108
test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence

test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence with node content

test-case.description: Test xsl:sequence adding atomic values to an element

test-case.description: Test xsl:sequence adding atomic values to an attribute

test-case.name: sequence-0112
test-case.description: initial comment Test xsl:sequence adding a document node to a result tree final comment

test-case.description: Test navigation from a parentless element

test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence with a type check (type check removed 2004-03-25, facility dropped from the spec)

test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence with atomization (type check removed 2004-03-25, facility dropped from the spec)

test-case.description: Basic test of "as" attribute on xsl:template

test-case.description: Test that root() is OK when the context node is in a non-document tree

test-case.name: sequence-0118
test-case.description: Test that in 2.0 mode the default separator in xsl:value of is a single space

test-case.name: sequence-0119
test-case.description: Test that in 1.0 mode xsl:value uses first-value semantics

test-case.description: Test xsl:sequence containing xsl:fallback

test-case.description: Test xsl:perform-sort with a sequence constructor

test-case.description: Test xsl:sequence with a fallback child

test-case.name: sequence-0124
test-case.description: Test pattern matching on parentless elements

test-case.name: sequence-0125
test-case.description: Test use of various axes within a sequence of parentless elements (this test is specifically designed to check the implementation of axes in a Saxon TinyTree forest, i.e. a TinyTree with multiple root nodes.)

test-case.description: Test subsequence() function with various non-integer parameters. NOTE: 2010-06-20 changed expected results for a6 in response to test suite bug 837 - MHK

test-case.description: Test use of current() within a "for" loop

test-case.description: Test sequence construction where a constructed item has the wrong type

test-case.description: Test sequence construction where a constructed item has the wrong cardinality

test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence with a failing type check

test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence with a failing type check

test-case.description: Basic error test of "as" attribute on xsl:template

test-case.description: Basic error test of "as" attribute on xsl:template

test-case.description: Test that '/' is an error when the context node is in a non-document tree

test-case.description: Test that '/x' is an error when the context node is in a non-document tree

test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence with content ERROR: xsl:sequence cannot have content

test-case.description: Test sequence construction using xsl:sequence with content. Not an error in 3.0

test-case.description: Test xsl:perform-sort with a sequence constructor ERROR: xsl:sort elements must come first

test-case.description: Test within xsl:for-each, xsl:sort must come first

test-case.description: xsl:for-each over sequence of atomic values

test-case.description: xsl:for-each over sequence of atomic values constructed by 'for'

test-case.description: test op:concatenate on nested sequences using for clauses

test-case.description: test op:concatenate on nested sequences, paren notation

test-case.description: Nest parentheses, with concatenation and range expressions

test-case.description: Test for positional indexing in sequence

test-case.description: range operator - empty sequence in arg2

test-case.name: sequence-0306
test-case.description: Test case to verify that no error is raised for using xs:untypedAtomic as the first argument of 'to' operand if the value can be casted to an integer.

test-case.name: sequence-0307
test-case.description: Test case to verify that no error is raised for using xs:untypedAtomic as the second argument of 'to' operand if the value can be casted to an integer.

test-case.name: sequence-0401
test-case.description: test op:concatenate on nested sequences with path expressions

result.assert-xml: <out>(a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i, j, k, l)</out>

test-case.description: test op:concatenate of nested sequences with path expressions, for clause, and for-each

test-case.description: test basic nesting of constructed sequences with path expressions, with xsl:for-each / xpath for expr

test-case.description: apply positional predicate to sequence.

test-case.description: sequence op:concatenate of nodes and for clause

test-case.description: Simple test of calling xsl:function from within the for loop, which stresses the variable stack.

modified.change: Bug 20291, removed expected whitespace and changed to indent=no

test-case.description: xsl:sequence instruction is missing the REQUIRED 'select' attribute.
